description: Module for setup of UserAccountProfile Avi RESTful Object

username.description: Username used for accessing Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_USERNAME).

max_concurrent_sessions.description: Maximum number of concurrent sessions allowed. There are unlimited sessions by default. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 0.

uuid.description: Unique object identifier of the object.

url.description: Avi controller URL of the object.

credentials_timeout_threshold.description: The time period after which credentials expire. Default is 180 days. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 180.

controller.description: IP address or hostname of the controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_CONTROLLER).

account_lock_timeout.description: Lock timeout period (in minutes). Default is 30 minutes. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 30.

state.description: The state that should be applied on the entity.

max_login_failure_count.description: Number of login attempts before lockout. Default is 3 attempts. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 3.

tenant.description: Name of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

max_password_history_count.description: Maximum number of passwords to be maintained in the password history. Default is 4 passwords. Default value when not specified in API or module is interpreted by Avi Controller as 4.

password.description: Password of Avi user in Avi controller. The default value is the environment variable C(AVI_PASSWORD).

tenant_uuid.description: UUID of tenant used for all Avi API calls and context of object.

api_version.description: Avi API version of to use for Avi API and objects.
